Summary: saw orange lights moving with no sound, in formation. they formed a triangle, and moved south.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Loveland
There were no other sightings in Loveland on or around July 30th 2008
divs: sighting detailsat 11:15 pm, on 7\30\08 i saw dim orange lights moving in formation. it only lasted about 5 seconds, then went past a tree and out of sight. they moved slow, and went from north, to south. there was no sound and they made made a triangle shape.
